feat: That was a Close One, Huh?
feat_markdown: That was a Close One, Huh?
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[That was a Close One, Huh?](/Feats.aspx?ID=3275) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 142</row>

**Archetype** [Unexpected Sharpshooter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=123)

**Frequency**
once per round

**Prerequisites**
[Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3272); Master in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Requirements**
Either you used Accidental Shot and hit your opponent with the Strike this turn, or you used Lucky Escape since your last turn and the triggering attack missed you.

</column>

---

You laugh innocently about the inexplicable luck of your last shot hitting its mark or how close the attack that just missed you came to taking your head off, causing your foes to second guess whether it's a good idea to oppose you in battle. Attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) either the foe you hit with [Accidental Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3272) or the foe that missed you due to [Lucky Escape](/Feats.aspx?ID=3273). You use [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) instead of Intimidation to attempt the check to Demoralize.
